name: Tubular Rift
description: Tubular Rift: In the far-flung future race on different planets.  In old tubes meant to hit the rift.  The rift being another dimension parallel to our own.  The rewards are great!  The consequences are even greater! As a racer in this vast universe, you are here to win.  Race across the galaxy, in order to take the title of Rift Champion. Race against the Universe most advance A.I. racers. Prove to the Universe that the human mind and reflexes are still better than A.I..  Race against other Humans who hungry to win.
